item.title: About me
item.description: CV You can download my cv here. 2019 Junior Gameplay programmer at Black Shamrock, Dublin (Ireland) I worked on an undisclosed AAA game made in custom Unreal Engine (Released soon), where I helped upgrading the UI and helped on feature implementation. My next project was an undisclosed AAA game where I mostly helped as a build engineer. I worked on an internal project in UE4 where I improved the AI.
